ELEMENT.SHORT: Contains just an HTML editor followed by a product list.
ELEMENT.TITLE: Simple text block and Product List (wiki friendly)

ELEMENT.HTML:
<html> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1"> <title>%SUBJECT%</title> </head>
<body style='font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#000000; background:#ffffff;'> <div style='font-size:9pt;' >

<% load($zoovy:prod_thumb); default(""); default($zoovy:prod_image1); image(w=>"85",h=>"85",bg=>"ffffff",tag=>"1",alt=>$zoovy:prod_name); print(); %>
<% load($zoovy:prod_name); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($zoovy:base_price); default(""); format(money); print(); %>
